title: Retailers Are Getting Tanked
sub_head: Rising fuel costs are cutting into sales of many goods, compounding some retailers’ woes
body:
It’s bad for a shop when customers start buying fewer of its wares. It is even worse if it still has a lot of those wares on its shelves. And it’s worse still if all the money customers have been putting into gasoline makes them think twice before buying more stuff.
That is where many retailers find themselves right now.
